name: 9 WORLDS
description:
A free and open simulation of the Norse world built in its full scale and majesty. This is a full scale reproduction of the Norse world as it is fully described in all available sources. It is intended for educational non-profit purposes, and anyone saying anything about copyright, I suppose that they can go talk to ODIN and THOR themselves. This is based on old mythologies. This is accurate, or intended to be. This simulation is intended to be a reliable historical/mythical tool.

See what there is to see, read what there is to read.

V 0.1 changelog

-basic gameplay format: wings, teleport stations. grappling hook is supposed to work but doesnt yet. sorry.

-world tree

-world tree creatures

-sun, moon, chasing wolves

-midgard

-ask, embla

-loki (you know where to find him…)

-ymir...or, whats left of him

-muspelheim, surtr

-niflheim

-mimir. mimir's well, tree, "mimirs library" and odin's eye

HAILSA TO THE GODS.
